What Happens First?

Come spend about 30 minutes with one of our team members sharing your background, your goals, and what has you interested in working with a personal trainer. Hear about the trainer's experience and how our program might work for you.

Important Details

Everything you need to know about how our training programs work

üí≥

Payment Details

Payment is made in advance on a monthly basis. We accept Visa, MasterCard, and Discover which will be used for auto-debit transactions monthly for amounts determined by the number of sessions in the chosen package.

üìã

Training Details

Each client will choose a Studio Services package for 2, 3, or 4 sessions per week at the current published rates. The client may change the number of sessions prior to each month's credit card debit. Training sessions are 30-minute periods as indicated on our scheduling calendar. Rescheduled sessions must be taken within the same billing cycle and cannot be carried over to the next.

‚ö†Ô∏è

Cancellations

  • Package Cancellation: A 30-day notice is required to cancel any training package.
  • Session Cancellation: A 24-hour notice is required to cancel a training session. Shorter notice periods will result in a charge for the missed session.
  • No-Show Policy: A 'no-show' missed session will result in a charge.
  • Lateness: Lateness to any session of more than 10 minutes will result in a cancellation and a charge.
  • Medical Form: TRANSFORM requires all clients to sign a medical form attesting to their physical condition for personal training.
  • Policy Changes: TRANSFORM reserves the right to change any of these policies without notice, including rate structures.
